1.prompt: You are at the entrance of the famed Island. Riches await! What will you do?

options.option: I don't want to do this! I will leave.
Explore the forest in front of you.
Explore the river in the distance.

2.prompt: You have left the Island. No treasure is worth this.

3.prompt: You have entered a dense forest. The sunlight fights against the unrelenting canopy on top.

options.option: A trail leads deeper into the forest. Follow it.
Over to the side, the forest is sparse around a river bank. Go there.

4.prompt: The emerald green waters of the river seem seductive and hostile all at once.

5.prompt: Insects chirp in the background as you make your way across the lush terrain. You start to notice some areas of interest.

options.option: An isolated hut seems to be hidden behind a set of trees. Maybe there's someone here? Enter the hut.
Up north, mountains are emerging and a trail continues toward them. Continue along the trail
Enough sight seeing, something seems off! Head back.

6.prompt:
The hut is silent. As you enter, you are startled by a figure seated in what looks to be a throne.
You realize it is the dead remains of an unfortunate treasure hunter.

7.prompt: You are the entering the rocky core of this island. A monolith in front of you has an opening to a large cave.

options.option: Nothing to see here. Head back.

8.prompt:
The body is pierced by what looks to be large spear tiggered by being seated on the throne.
You find a letter on the body. It reads: 'Greed is a lever.'

options.option: Greed did this person no good. Exit the hut.
